nodes.text: Plastocrete was a construction material that could be used to make landing pads. One landing pad on the planet Akiva was made from the material, but by the time of the Rebellion on Akiva it was shattered, with plants growing up through it. Some of the streets of the city of Myrra on Akiva were also made of plastocrete.
Plastocrete first appeared in the novel Aftermath, which was written by Chuck Wendig and published in 2015.
